mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.leader_id, p.description, p.leader_name, p.is_deleted, m.id AS module_id, m.name AS module_name, m.description AS moduleDescription, m.is_delete, m.project_id FROM tb_project p LEFT JOIN tb_module m ON p.id = m.project_id WHERE p.is_deleted = 0 AND (m.is_delete = 0 OR m.is_delete IS NULL);

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.leader_id, p.description, p.leader_name, p.is_deleted, m.id AS module_id, m.name AS module_name, m.description AS moduleDescription, m.is_delete, m.project_id FROM tb_project p LEFT JOIN tb_module m ON p.id = m.project_id WHERE p.is_deleted = 0 AND (m.is_delete = 0 OR m.is_delete IS NULL) AND p.id = #{id};
